description: Try our easy to follow Quinoa & Fetta Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Grain salad,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,High protein,Soy free,Wheat free,Peanut free
name: Quinoa & Fetta Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse quinoa under cold running water. Place into a saucepan with 2 cups water and bring to the boil. Reduce heat until simmering. Partly cover and simmer for 15 minutes or until tender. Remove from heat, cover and set aside for 10 minutes.
Combine quinoa with tomato, cucumber, onion, parsley, spinach and rocket. Combine oil and lemon juice. Drizzle dressing over. Top with feta. Serve.
